text: Nihsandeha kiyamata (antimadina) ko jnana allahala'i nai cha. Ra usaile jala brsti gara'umcha ra usaile garbhasayaharuma bha'eko kura jandacha (arthata nara cha ki mada). Ra kunai vyaktila'i thaha chaina ki bholi usale ke garnecha. Ra kunai manisala'i thaha chaina ki kuna bhuâ€“bhagama usako mrtyu hune cha. (Yadarakha)allaha nai sabai jannevala, ra pratyeka kurosita avagata cha
